databaseConfig.sql:
INSERT INTO MS_DM_TEMPLATE_FILE ( MS_DM_TEMPLATE_FILE_ID , UPDATE_DATE , TEMPLATE_FILE_NAME , DATA , MS_DM_HOUKOKUSHO_ID ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_DM_TEMPLATE_FILE_ID , :UPDATE_DATE , :TEMPLATE_FILE_NAME , :DATA , :MS_DM_HOUKOKUSHO_ID , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_DM_TEMPLATE_FILE SET UPDATE_DATE = :UPDATE_DATE , TEMPLATE_FILE_NAME = :TEMPLATE_FILE_NAME , DATA = :DATA , MS_DM_HOUKOKUSHO_ID = :MS_DM_HOUKOKUSHO_ID , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_DM_TEMPLATE_FILE_ID = :MS_DM_TEMPLATE_FILE_ID
